zls.enable_semantic_tokens.description: Enables semantic token support when the client also supports it

zls.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

zls.enable_inlay_hints.description: Enables inlay hint support when the client also supports it

zls.check_for_update.description: Whether to automatically check for new updates

zls.inlay_hints_show_builtin.description: Enable inlay hints for builtin functions

zls.inlay_hints_exclude_single_argument.description: Don't show inlay hints for single argument calls

zls.debugLog.description: Enable debug logging in release builds of zls.

zls.inlay_hints_hide_redundant_param_nam.description: Hides inlay hints when parameter name matches the identifier (e.g. foo: foo)

zls.enable_snippets.description: Enables snippet completions when the client also supports them

zls.inlay_hints_hide_redundant_param_nam.description: Hides inlay hints when parameter name matches the last token of a parameter node (e.g. foo: bar.foo, foo: &foo)

zls.operator_completions.description: Enables `*` and `?` operators in completion lists

zls.enable_autofix.description: Whether to automatically fix errors on save. Currently supports adding and removing discards.

zls.warn_style.description: Enables warnings for style guideline mismatches

zls.highlight_global_var_declarations.description: Whether to highlight global var declarations

zls.use_comptime_interpreter.description: Whether to use the comptime interpreter

zls.include_at_in_builtins.description: Whether the @ sign should be part of the completion of builtins

zls.skip_std_references.description: When true, skips searching for references in std. Improves lookup speed for functions in user's code. Renaming and go-to-definition will continue to work as is

zls.max_detail_length.description: The detail field of completions is truncated to be no longer than this (in bytes)

zls.builtin_path.description: Path to 'builtin;' useful for debugging, automatically set if let null

zls.global_cache_path.description: Path to a directroy that will be used as zig's cache. null is equivalent to `${KnownFloders.Cache}/zls`

zls.zig_lib_path.description: Zig library path, e.g. `/path/to/zig/lib/zig`, used to analyze std library imports

zls.build_runner_path.description: Path to the `build_runner.zig` file provided by zls. null is equivalent to `${executable_directory}/build_runner.zig`

zls.enable_import_embedfile_argument_com.description: Whether to enable import/embedFile argument completions

zls.zig_exe_path.description: Zig executable path, e.g. `/path/to/zig/zig`, used to run the custom build runner. If `null`, zig is looked up in `PATH`. Will be used to infer the zig standard library path if none is provided
